comment: If you like dark cherry, leather and tobacco, and high proof, you have found a friend!
Love the PX balance on this amazing whiskey.

Had a pour of this at a liquor store. Amazing. The nose was very rich with raisins, cream, and nuttiness. It smelled like a fruit ‘n nut bar. On the palate; wow! I’ve read many reviews of whiskies that talk about an explosion of flavour on the palate and I get it now. It felt like a water ballon popped in my mouth. So, juicy and refreshing at first. Sweet berries, leather, creamy, and then this beautiful oak at the very end. Absolutely stunning.

Cask PX100630019A bottled 2016.04.30, aged 5 years 10 months. A deep dark and rich dram with notes of chocolate, raisins, tropical fruit, spices, dates, cherries, bananas, coconuts, a little coffee, and nutty and creamy.

Sweet raisiny goodness.
Hot.
Almost has a vegetal taste to it. Borderline hint of licorice root.
The heat is fantastic though.
In my opinion, don't add water and ride out the heat on this. Still stays very sharpe with water.
Damn! Best pour I ever tasted. Checks all the boxes for me. Rich, sweet, some spice, heat, great nose-raisins, chocolate, velvety finish with slight fruit juice aftertaste. Wow.
Kavalan had 15 bottles out to taste at The Whisky Show London 2018, plus this if you asked nicely.
This an amazing full bodied whiskey. A strong raisin and fruity presence with a strong coffee finish. Such a powerful whiskey, a dram takes you a long way.
